A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: RIAN RUINED THE STAR WARS SAGA!!!!  Don't believe Ny of these idiotic 4 & 5 star reviews.  Who is Snoke? Doesn't matter because he's dead now. Why is Rey so strong? No idea. She just is because\, uhh...girl power. Who are the Knights of Ren? No clue. But perhaps the worst injustice is that the film completely kills Luke. Not just in a physical sense. They kill his entire legacy. When Mark Hamill said he fundamentally disagreed with everything about his character in this film\, he wasn't kidding.
